description: The user is experiencing issues preventing Windows Copilot from functioning as intended. Attempts to disable the Windows Copilot features via registry settings (specifically using `hklm\software\policies\microsoft\windows\windowscopilot` and `hklm\software\policies\microsoft\edge`) are found to be ineffective. The interventions involving registry additions may require further testing to confirm their success or failure in actual scenarios, indicating potential complications or overlooked configurations in the relevant system build process.
